snippet: Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif’s trip to North Waziristan was a show of support for the military and an effort to improve relations with its generals.
abstract: Pakistani Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif visits military camp in tribal district of North Waziristan in show of support for the military and an effort to improve relations with its generals.

byline.contributor: Ismail Khan contributed reporting from Peshawar, Pakistan.

lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif’s trip to North Waziristan was a show of support for the military and an effort to improve relations with its generals.

headline.main: Premier of Pakistan Visits Troops in Tribal Area
headline.print_headline: Premier of Pakistan Visits Troops in Tribal Area
